column5: To all us Moms and those looking down on us....Happy Mother's Day  And I am going to be spending mine at the hospital.  My son has a swollen ankle...I told him not to try to "take me"  lol

Happy Mother's Day to you Nancy.  Should be agreat one for me My wife is the mother of 3 .  Going to spoil(with gifts) my wife my mom and my sister who at 38 just had her first little boy who is now 6 months old.  Going to Mom's for a BBQ.  Take care of your boy's ankle.Enjoy

Hope all mothers enjoy their special day,  Just remember and be thankful what each of our mothers have done for us over all the years.   Take time today and let her know it.    We're having my mother over for dinner tonite and I may even let her pass on helping wiht the dishes this time.
Happy mother's day to all the moms out there and hope this day is filled with happyness
Happy MOTHERS DAY Nancy... sorry about Tman...  Ken

Well my mom is across the big blue  pond so won't be spending time with her today.  Think i may get my tookish out and fish for a few hrs this avo.......Was hoping my boys would be here with me today but they are all working.  Hope your boys ankle is feeling better soon hun.
The ankle is sprained...it is I who is his little slave today
